mapper.select: select store_no as storeNo, member_id as memberId, store_title as storeTitle, store_category as storeCategory, store_content as storeContent, store_product as storeProduct, store_productcontent as storeProductcontent, store_price as storePrice, store_count as storeCount, store_delivery as storeDelivery, store_return as storeReturn, store_change as storeChange, store_reportcount as storeReportcount, store_warning as storeWarning, store_img1 as storeImg1, store_img2 as storeImg2, store_img3 as storeImg3 from store
